short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance productivity and thrive with Flo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your productivity and thrive with FLO. Set a lofty goal and put your North Star in motion by creating actionable tasks. Combat procrastination, and gain momentum with the Pomodoro timer technique. Improve accountability and intention by reflecting on your timed sessions. Gain insight on your trends to improve future sessions and maximize impact.
